overview_of_class: This combined, multi-skill third and fourth year Russian class focuses on sustained conversational skills, and continued development of advanced writing and reading skills. Exploration of the modern Russian language and culture is through readings, video, film, and discussion.
name: Modern Russian Readings and Language
title: WCAS SLAVIC 303-3-1 Modern Russian Readings and Language

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This combined, multi-skill third and fourth year Russian class focuses on sustained conversational skills, and continued development of advanced writing and reading skills. Exploration of the modern Russian language and culture is through readings, video, film, and discussion.

subject: SLAVIC
